Hi! I am a lady of many names, including:
Hina (Public name)
Usagi (Nickname when I feel like being Sailor Moon)
Narāmtu-Ištar (Akkadian theophoric name; Darling of Ishtar, Cuneiform: 𒈾𒊏𒄠𒌅𒀭𒈹)
Naneδāy (Sogdian theophoric name; Nana's Maidservant)
and many more.

I'm your typical autistic lesbian trans catgirl (she/her, mew neopronouns if you're close :3) with Ehlers-Danlos who has an unhealthy obsession with Ishtar, Mesopotamia, Sogdia, the Silk Road, Chinese Opera, Visual Kei, and Eurodance. Come say hi, I don't bite :3

I'm mixed Vietnamese, but I prefer not to be classified by Western racial terms. Kindly, please do not racialize me. I am a human

No authoritarians. I am a queer anarchist and I don't entertain fascists or tankies.

I post lewd stuff, under CWs. Minors that interact with these posts will be blocked. This isn't a minors DNI account, but this is an Act Responsibly Regardless of Age account.
I am demisexual, I will not flirt with you

I understand there is discourse about me, and that I may have a reputation among some fedi circles as a problematic user, due to misunderstandings and drama I never asked to be in. Just give me a chance, that's all I ask. If you still find you don't like me, that's fine, just don't knock me until you've gotten to know me
